## Description {#details}

A pass that runs on each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a> in a function.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regionpass">RegionPass</a> is managed by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/rgpassmanager">RGPassManager</a>.

Definition at line 32 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/regionpass-h">RegionPass.h</a>.

### createPrinterPass {#af9791a6c4ebc5fc6ab6cd26d739ce965}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Get a pass to print the LLVM IR in the region.

Get the printer pass.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="O">The output stream to print the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a>.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Banner">The banner to separate different printed passes.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
The pass to print the LLVM IR in the region.
</SectionUser>

### runOnRegion {#aebf6dc4e02bc6a1f544af50b8921ec2c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual bool llvm::RegionPass::runOnRegion (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a> &#42; R, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/rgpassmanager">RGPassManager</a> &amp; RGM)</>}>
Run the pass on a specific <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a>.

Accessing regions not contained in the current region is not allowed.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="R">The region this pass is run on.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="RGM">The RegionPassManager that manages this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a>.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if the pass modifies this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a>.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/regionpass-h/#l00048">48</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/regionpass-h">RegionPass.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### skipRegion {#a2a3749e0f47aa3b73df3ac0e66a78771}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool RegionPass::skipRegion (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a> &amp; R) const</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Optional passes call this function to check whether the pass should be skipped.

This is the case when optimization bisect is over the limit.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/regionpass-h/#l00083">83</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/regionpass-h">RegionPass.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/regionpass-cpp/#l00283">283</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/regionpass-cpp">RegionPass.cpp</a>.
